solution.title: Share Of Voice DCM
solution.description: Compare a client to 5 or more peers using impressions by region, market area, platform, and creative type.
pitches: Show evidence for market area, platform, or creative focus.
Show evidence for level of performance.
Includes checks to comply with data policy.
instructions: You will need access to all DCM Accounts ( add profile ).
A tab called SOV_DCM_Peers will be added to the trix, with instructions.
Wait for BigQuery->StarThinker Data->{{DATASET}}->Share_Of_Voice_DCM to be created, or click Run Now.
Copy Share Of Voice Sample Data ( Copy From This ).
Click Edit Connection, and change to BigQuery->StarThinker Data->{{DATASET}}->Share_Of_Voice_DCM.
Copy Share Of Voice Sample Report ( Copy From This ).
When prompted choose the new data source you just created. And you have a dashboard!
Or give the dashboard connect intructions to the client.
